parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the lane group.

parameters.name: LabelSelectorKey
parameters.description: The label key of the associated service workload. Set the value to `ASM_TRAFFIC_TAG`.

parameters.name: LabelSelectorValue
parameters.description: The label value of the associated service workload.``

parameters.name: ServiceMeshId
parameters.description: The ID of the Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

parameters.name: ServicesList
parameters.description: The list of services associated with the lane. The value is a JSON array. The format of a single service is `$Cluster name/$Cluster ID/$Namespace/$Service name`.
